system.description:
Characters raised in the shadow elf culture share a variety of traits in common with one another. 

Umbral Acclimation. Prolonged exposure to sheer darkness has improved your ability to see without light. The range of your darkvision increases to 120 feet. If you didn’t have darkvision already, you gain darkvision to a range of 60 feet.

Shadow Elf Weapon Training. You have proficiency with rapiers and hand crossbows. 

Shadow Lore. You know a cantrip: either @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.kh26gom04osoo005]{dancing lights}or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.4oruofw2q7gso9hq]{minor illusion}. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.z7r6plq6vyesck07]{faerie fire} once per long rest . At 5th level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.0ou0qutr7p2bedg0]{darkness} once per long rest. You don’t need material components for these spells, and when casting them your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (whichever is highest).

Languages. You can read, speak, write, and sign Common, Elvish, and Undercommon.
